cause.description:
This will be my 8th year participating in Aids Walk Vancouver.
AIDS WALK is a celebration of life for those living with HIV and AIDS, and a time of reflection and tribute for those we've lost.
AIDS carries many misconceptions and stigma, but it affects more people than you know - from all walks of life, young and adult. It is estimated that 39.5 million people are living with this currently incurable disease.
Please join me as I walk in support for awareness of - and a future without - AIDS.
1. "The Walk will do us good."
cause.mission: Create hope for a future without HIV and AIDS
cause.name: Aids Walk for Life 2007 Vancouver
